website_summaries.verdict: The Venice H2, KEEN’s multi-sport sandal has a modern look, a comfortable interior, a wide toe-box, an excellent arch support, and a thick sole which won the vote of many. It's an easy-to-wear, quick-drying, all-around footgear applauded for its toe bumper--a trail-ready feature which protects forefoot from protrusions encountered on the way. A few users, however, were disappointed about its durability issues.
pros: The KEEN Venice H2 is the choice of the majority, owing to its all-around features
A large number of users acknowledged the hiking sandal for its comfort
Many wearers mentioned that the sole was sufficiently thick
It kept their underfoot safe and reduced the effect of craggy roughness on trails
KEEN Venice H2 is a closed-toe hiking sandal
Many users appreciated how its front bumper protected their toes from debris and rocks
A lot of individuals were satisfied with the excellent arch support offered by the sandal
The wide toe-box was welcomed by numerous buyers
It provided sufficient space for natural toe splaying while walking
Several purchasers admired the cool looks and easy-to-wear style of the Keen Venice H2
A few people pointed out that the footgear took very little time to dry after getting wet
cons: A handful of buyers complained that the footwear started to wear off after only several days of walking

customer_reviews.title: Cooler to wear than Newports
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Venice instead of Newports, which I have been buying for years. The larger openings seem to make them cooler to wear. I will know for sure after this Texas summer. I am a bit disappointed that the soles do not have the razor siping that all my Newports have had. That may make them a bit more slippery on wet surfaces but I have not confirmed that yet.
customer_reviews.author: DeWayne

customer_reviews.title: I love Keens
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd pair of Keens. Heavy duty robust sandals for warmer weather. Because they cover the toes, I wear these for just about everything. Even carpentry. I ride my bike often, and these offer great protection while keeping my feet cooler than shoes. Like every other pair I've owned: get 1/2 size larger than your usual size. I marked "fit as expected", even though I ordered that 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony H.

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal
customer_reviews.text: My 1st pair of Keen’s lasted close to 15 years. And that includes walks in water around waterfalls as well as mostly only footwear worn in summer. Well made,,,,I wear an 11 ...ordered an 11...and fits fine. Great price on this one, too.
customer_reviews.author: windsor3189

customer_reviews.title: A wee bit snug
customer_reviews.text: The sandals offer great support accruals the arch. I was surprised that they were just a little snug. Very sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Typical Good Quality Keen product
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, really wanted the Keen open toe, but haven’t been available for some time. Got the closed toe equivalent, because straps are well spaced over heated toe is not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Machog

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these sandals. I will more than likely always buy Keen sandals in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jergens

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: Really like this style of keen and color was not available when I purchased last pair. Love the shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: joecooper

customer_reviews.title: Keen quality
customer_reviews.text: I already have 3-4 pairs of Keens sandals so I know what I'm getting and it is a good product
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product is very, good, I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Comfortable Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have newports that frankly have never felt comfortable. So I took a chance on these venice sandals. These leather venice sandals fit perfect and are very comfortable. A huge improvement over newports. Easy to slip on, comfortable, and I have received many nice comments on their looks. I wish they can in fabric in addition to leather. The fabric ones seem difficult to fine on the internet. (PS - I am a 7.5 and ordered a 7.5......perfect fit)
customer_reviews.author: Scott D Schone

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: fits well ,tough and built well. I wear them for fishing ,works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking good quality. Easy to put on and adjust. My husband wears a 9.5 shoe and got a 9.5 Sandal. He said they seem a little big but not too big. He would probably go with a 9 instead. After wearing a while my husband said the slightly larger size isn’t really an issue. They are easy to get in and out of and tighten up a little bit if needed. He said they are warmer to wear than his Teva sandals since the toe is closed and there is more material. But this closeness also makes the sandals more sturdy and provides better footing than other sandals. He highly recommends these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Overall these are the best sandals that I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are comfortable, stable, and light. I took them on a camping trip right after getting them and I wanted to put them to the test. Most sandals leave hot spots without socks, but these didn’t do this at all. Even after getting them wet, they performed great. I walked a loose gravel path, and didn’t have the usual slipping around and instability that most sandals do when walking on unstable surfaces. The base is solid and the contour of the shoe kept my foot sitting solid in the mold of the shoe. Overall these are the best sandals that I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Ljd1978

customer_reviews.title: Nice And Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit very nice and the soles make walking a pleasure. I hadn’t noticed that they were closed toe with a black rubber covering the front of the sandals but I’ll get used to that one thing I don’t like about them. They have been made to a high standard and the stitching is top notch and consistent and straight throughout the sandals. The soles are no scuff and no slip. They are easy on and easy off with just enough stretching to accommodate that action. I’ve worn them for a few days now and I’m happy with how they fit my feet. Four Stars⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar Vogtmann

customer_reviews.title: Nice-looking sandal for activity and fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is a stable and secure, quality sandal - KEEN Venice H2-m - Brown. My husband is happy. He especially likes how the sandal feels on the back of his heels, the back strap fits comfortably. These are water sandals, but they can easily pivot to an all-around shoe. They are good looking. They feature waterproof leather uppers and great construction. There is a lot of ventilation, and also toe protection. They are even machine washable. Highly recommend. Fit is to size.
customer_reviews.author: W. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Men's size 10.5
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals, my husband abused his into oblivion about a year ago and he was so thrilled I found these. The fit is perfect, he wears between a size 10.5 and a 11. These fit comfortably, your toes are protected and we hike, camp and canoe in them. Solid construction, comfortable interior with no odd edging or exposed stitching that will rub your feet raw. You have the free low air of a sandal and the comfort and protection (almost) of a hiking shoe/boot.
customer_reviews.author: LVT

customer_reviews.title: Keen quality
customer_reviews.text: I've long since skipped non-quality brands. I love a limited number of brands and Keen is one of them. I like the semi-closed design because my feet are not the best (toe nail fungus, athlete's foot) so I kind of want to cover most of it but because of the issues, it's good to have footwear that breathes. Built really well. Nice design, very comfortable on sole and straps.
customer_reviews.author: Hesed2020

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I own/have owned MANY pairs of various Keen footwear. My foot is size 13 and Keens usually fit me perfectly. However, these size 13 sandals are definitely too short. I’m returning them and ordering size 14. Will update when they arrive.
customer_reviews.author: JoeG

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable and provide solid support. I often have a tough time finding the right shoes (especially since my feet are slightly different from each other), but I'm very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: “KEEN Men's Venice H2-m” is great high-quality sandals. I have been using Keen hiking shoes, boots, and sandals for years, and this one didn’t disappoint. They are very sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Scientist

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good
customer_reviews.text: They fit really well and were very comfy. My only issue with them are they will rub against the back of your foot. But other than that they were pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It would be awesome of I could get these, but since I am a woman I can't
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. But it seems only men (or those who can wear men's sizes) get to wear sandals like these. I'm incredibly disappointed that Keen only offers robust sandals for women that come in stereotypically "female" colors. I'd like these sandals, or the Newport version, to be available for women again. Totally disappointed by Keen these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: KEEN Men's 1002325 Sandal
feature_bullets: Non-marking rubber outsole leaves no trace
EVA footbed with arch support for all-day comfort
